clMessages.help:
**rb!help** => Displays this message
**rb!rolemessage** => prints a message of all roles available with the reactions to add to those roles
**rb!setmessage** => (for server owners only) this command allows server owners to set a message that users can react to with specified emojis that will add them to their desired roles
USAGE:
	rb!setmessage 
	:emoji: @serverrole
clMessages.joinMessage:
Thank you for inviting me to your server!
Here are some commands to get you started

**rb!help** => displays the help message
**rb!setmessage** => allows the server owner to set up a reactable message for others to select joinable roles on
clMessages.formatMessage: The rb!setmessage command does not have the correct format given.
clMessages.minReqMessage: The reaction message must have at least one line with a role and an associated emoji
clMessages.animatedMessage: Emojis used for role association cannot be animated
clMessages.permission:
Role Bot does not have permission to add or remove users from this role.
If you want to add users to this role the server owner must move the role bot higher than the desired role in the role rankings

userMessages.currentMember: You are already a member of the
userMessages.added: You have been added to the
userMessages.removed: You have been removed from the
userMessages.moreThanOne: You cannot assign yourself to multiple roles on a designated 'CHOOSE ONE' role message
